alert.note: Alert for Greene; Monroe; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 10:38AM EST until March 12 at 3:36PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. White River at Spencer. White River at Newberry. White River at Elliston. White River at Hazleton. White River at Petersburg. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers due to rainfall last weekend. Minor flooding is occurring, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. New precipitation amounts through the weekend will not impact current flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.2 feet, High water affects Owen County Fairgrounds parking lot and county roads in the Freedom area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EST Friday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 2.4 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
